Package com.mojang.blaze3d.platform

Class GlStateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mojang.blaze3d.platform.GlStateManager
  • @Environment(CLIENT)
public class GlStateManager
extends Object
    Allows calling the static methods in GL11 without actually touching it
